full_content: Security Pro 8.0 Welcome to your next step in cybersecurity learning. In this module, you will build a strong foundation of concepts that are crucial for defending information and systems in today's interconnected world. Throughout this course, you will encounter real-world scenarios, practical simulations, and clear explanations designed to prepare you for both technical challenges and security decision-making processes. Whether you're new to cybersecurity or expanding your current skillset, the lessons ahead are structured to support your growth and understanding of essential security principles. As you progress, you'll explore a series of topics that highlight core principles and introduce you to the tools and strategies needed to recognize and mitigate threats. Through interactive activities and practical exercises, you will gain hands-on experience applying security measures and controls. By the end of this module, you will have a solid grasp of the foundational concepts and practical skills you’ll need to protect information assets and contribute to a safer digital environment. Examine the fundamental principles and goals of information security. Identify and describe various types of security controls and their roles in risk management. Explore common security threats and basic countermeasures to defend against them. Practice applying knowledge in a realistic, interactive security simulator. Develop your ability to analyze security scenarios and recommend appropriate controls.
